participant_1.background:
I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years.
I will continue to share my love of comic books and animals with others through my blog.
I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.
sometimes i wish i didn t have to wake up in the morning.
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

content.text: Good! I'm getting ready for a city council meeting.
How fun! I'm a huge fan of politics. What do you do for the city council?
I'm the head of the arts and culture committee. I like to use my art to communicate with people.
That's really cool! What kind of art do you make?
I'm a painter. I like to use bright colors and abstract shapes to create my pieces.
I love abstract paintings! I think they're so interesting.
Thank you! I'm glad you like them.
I'm sure you're a great council member. You seem to be passionate about your work.
What's your favorite thing about living in a big city?
I love the diversity of the people here. There's always something new to see and do.
That's one of my favorite things about big cities too. I love meeting new people from all over the world.
Me too! It's so interesting to learn about different cultures.
I wish I could live in a big city, but I'm not sure if I could handle the hustle and bustle.
It can be a lot to take in at first, but I think it's worth it. There's so much to do and see.
Maybe I'll have to give it a try sometime.
